languages.text: Блаженная сестра Арджента многие циклы разыскивала Ульфара, чтобы попытаться спасти от обуявшего его отчаяния. Настигнув его на кровавой тропе, устланной телами врагов Человечества, она безуспешно просила Ульфара стать паладином Ордена Единственной звезды, сулила товарищество и надежду. Но Одинокий Волк не внял словам доброй сестры.

Blessed Sister Argenta spent many cycles looking for Ulfar to try to save him from his despair. When she caught up with him on a bloody path littered with bodies of enemies of Humanity, she begged Ulfar to become a paladin of the Order of the One Star, promising hope and companionship. But the Lone Wolf did not heed the words of the good sister.
languages.original_text: Блаженная сестра Арджента многие циклы разыскивала Ульфара, чтобы попытаться спасти от обуявшего его отчаяния. Настигнув его на кровавой тропе, устланной телами врагов Человечества, она безуспешно просила Ульфара стать паладином Ордена Единственной звезды, сулила товарищество и надежду. Но Одинокий Волк не внял словам доброй сестры.

traits.locale_text: Blessed Sister Argenta spent many cycles looking for Ulfar to try to save him from his despair. When she caught up with him on a bloody path littered with bodies of the enemies of Humanity, she begged Ulfar to become a paladin of the Order of the One Star, promising hope and companionship. But the Lone Wolf did not heed the words of the good sister.

But the Lone Wolf did not heed the words of the good sister.

When she caught up with him on a bloody path littered with bodies of enemies of Humanity, she begged Ulfar to become a paladin of the Order of the One Star, promising hope and companionship. But the Lone Wolf did not heed the words of the good sister.

Blessed Sister Argenta spent many cycles looking for Ulfar to try to save him from his despair. When she caught up with him on a bloody path littered with bodies of enemies of Humanity, she begged Ulfar to become a paladin of the Order of the One Star, promising hope and companionship. But the Lone Wolf did not heed the words of the good sister.

languages.text: 受到祝福的阿洁塔修女花了无数时间寻找乌尔法，试图将他从绝望之中拯救出来。到最后，她在一条铺满了人类之敌尸体的血腥小路中找到了他。她恳求乌尔法成为“命运之星”修会的圣骑士，承诺会给予他希望与陪伴，但这头独狼并没有听进去阿洁塔修女的话。
languages.original_text: Blessed Sister Argenta spent many cycles looking for Ulfar to try to save him from his despair. When she caught up with him on a bloody path littered with bodies of enemies of Humanity, she begged Ulfar to become a paladin of the Order of the One Star, promising hope and companionship. But the Lone Wolf did not heed the words of the good sister.

traits.locale_text: 受到祝福的阿洁塔修女花了无数时间寻找乌尔法，试图将他从绝望之中拯救出来。到最后，她在一条铺满了人类之敌尸体的血腥小路中找到了他。她恳求乌尔法成为“命运之星”修会的圣骑士，承诺会给予他希望与陪伴，但这头独狼并没有听进去阿洁塔修女的话。

languages.text: 祝福されたシスター・アルジェンタは、ウルファーを絶望から救おうと多くのサイクルを彼を探して過ごした。人類の敵の死体が散乱した血まみれの道で彼に追いついた時、彼女は希望と親交を約束し、ウルファーに一つ星騎士団のパラディンとなるよう懇願した。しかし一匹狼は善良なシスターの言葉を聞き入れなかった。
languages.original_text: Blessed Sister Argenta spent many cycles looking for Ulfar to try to save him from his despair. When she caught up with him on a bloody path littered with bodies of enemies of Humanity, she begged Ulfar to become a paladin of the Order of the One Star, promising hope and companionship. But the Lone Wolf did not heed the words of the good sister.

traits.locale_text: 祝福されたシスター・アルジェンタは、ウルファーを絶望から救おうと多くのサイクルを彼を探して過ごした。人類の敵の死体が散乱した血まみれの道で彼に追いついた時、彼女は希望と親交を約束し、ウルファーに一つ星騎士団のパラディンとなるよう懇願した。しかし一匹狼は善良なシスターの言葉を聞き入れなかった。

languages.text: La sainte Sœur Argenta passa de nombreux cycles à chercher Ulfar pour tenter de le sauver de son désespoir. Lorsqu'elle le retrouva sur un chemin sanglant jonché de corps d'ennemis de l'humanité, elle le supplia de devenir un paladin de l'Ordre de l'Étoile unique, en lui promettant de l'espoir et des compagnons. Toutefois, le Space Wolf solitaire n'écouta pas la brave sœur.
languages.original_text: Blessed Sister Argenta spent many cycles looking for Ulfar to try to save him from his despair. When she caught up with him on a bloody path littered with bodies of enemies of Humanity, she begged Ulfar to become a paladin of the Order of the One Star, promising hope and companionship. But the Lone Wolf did not heed the words of the good sister.

traits.locale_text: La sainte Sœur Argenta passa de nombreux cycles à chercher Ulfar pour tenter de le sauver de son désespoir. Lorsqu'elle le retrouva sur un chemin sanglant jonché de corps d'ennemis de l'humanité, elle le supplia de devenir un paladin de l'Ordre de l'Étoile unique, en lui promettant de l'espoir et des compagnons. Toutefois, le Space Wolf solitaire n'écouta pas la brave sœur.

languages.text: La bendita hermana Argenta pasó muchos ciclos buscando a Ulfar para intentar salvarlo de su desesperación. Cuando por fin lo encontró en un camino atestado de cadáveres de los enemigos de la Humanidad, suplicó a Ulfar que se convirtiera en paladín de la Orden de la Estrella Única, prometiéndole esperanza y compañía. El Lobo Solitario, no obstante, hizo caso omiso de las palabras de la buena hermana.
languages.original_text: Blessed Sister Argenta spent many cycles looking for Ulfar to try to save him from his despair. When she caught up with him on a bloody path littered with bodies of enemies of Humanity, she begged Ulfar to become a paladin of the Order of the One Star, promising hope and companionship. But the Lone Wolf did not heed the words of the good sister.

traits.locale_text: La bendita hermana Argenta pasó muchos ciclos buscando a Ulfar para intentar salvarlo de su desesperación. Cuando por fin lo encontró en un camino atestado de cadáveres de los enemigos de la Humanidad, suplicó a Ulfar que se convirtiera en paladín de la Orden de la Estrella Única, prometiéndole esperanza y compañía. El Lobo Solitario, no obstante, hizo caso omiso de las palabras de la buena hermana.

languages.text: Die gesegnete Schwester Argenta suchte viele Zyklen nach Ulfar, um ihn aus seiner Verzweiflung zu befreien. Als sie ihn auf einem blutigen Pfad schließlich fand, gesäumt mit Leichen von Feinden der Menschheit, bat sie Ulfar, ein Paladin des Ordens vom Einen Stern zu werden, was ihm Hoffnung und Gefährten bringen werde. Aber der einsame Wolf hörte nicht auf die Worte der guten Schwester.
languages.original_text: Blessed Sister Argenta spent many cycles looking for Ulfar to try to save him from his despair. When she caught up with him on a bloody path littered with bodies of enemies of Humanity, she begged Ulfar to become a paladin of the Order of the One Star, promising hope and companionship. But the Lone Wolf did not heed the words of the good sister.

traits.locale_text: Die gesegnete Schwester Argenta suchte viele Zyklen nach Ulfar, um ihn aus seiner Verzweiflung zu befreien. Als sie ihn auf einem blutigen Pfad schließlich fand, gesäumt mit Leichen von Feinden der Menschheit, bat sie Ulfar, ein Paladin des Ordens vom Einen Stern zu werden, was ihm Hoffnung und Gefährten bringen werde. Aber der einsame Wolf hörte nicht auf die Worte der guten Schwester.

languages.text: Kutsanmış Rahibe Argenta, yaşadığı umutsuzluktan onu kurtarmak adına sayısız döngü boyunca Ulfar'ı aradı. İnsanlığın düşmanlarının cesetleriyle dolu bir yolu takip edip nihayet ona ulaştığında, Ulfar'a Emsalsiz Yıldız Tarikatı'nın bir paladini olması için yalvardı ve ona umut ile yoldaşlık sözü verdi. Ancak Yalnız Kurt, iyi yürekli rahibenin sözlerine kulak asmadı.
languages.original_text: Blessed Sister Argenta spent many cycles looking for Ulfar to try to save him from his despair. When she caught up with him on a bloody path littered with bodies of enemies of Humanity, she begged Ulfar to become a paladin of the Order of the One Star, promising hope and companionship. But the Lone Wolf did not heed the words of the good sister.

traits.locale_text: Kutsanmış Rahibe Argenta, onu içinde bulunduğu umutsuzluktan kurtarmak adına sayısız döngü boyunca Ulfar'ı aradı. İnsanlığın düşmanlarının cesetleriyle dolu bir yolu takip edip nihayet ona ulaştığında, Ulfar'a Emsalsiz Yıldız Tarikatı'nın bir paladini olması için yalvardı ve ona umut ve yoldaşlık sözü verdi. Ancak Yalnız Kurt, iyi yürekli rahibenin sözlerine kulak asmadı.
